TopicTitle: Switching map view breaks with launch configuration (Xbox)

Articles.Content:
Problem: One of my launch configurations (boosters + probe) breaks map view.

No problems until I added an extra fuel tank to my central booster. Now, even sitting on the launch pad, if I switch map views, several symptoms appear. None of my other projects have this problem. The project contains 76 parts in 6 stages. It's smaller than most.

1. The graphics get very weird, e.g. the screen is mostly black and the sun is only an outline.

2. Switching back does nothing.

3. I cannot revert flight (the menu doesn't even come up) and must restart game to clear the problem.

Has anyone else seen this?

Edited November 6, 2016 by LightYearsToGo
Added project info.
